operator.title: Read Collection MongoDB
operator.synopsis: Reads documents from a MongoDB collection.

text.paragraph: This operator retrieves a collection of documents from the specified MongoDB collection.

outputPorts.port: The documents retrieved from the MongoDB collection.

parameters.parameter: The MongoDB instance to be used for storing the documents.
The MongoDB collection in which the documents are stored.
Whether the number of results should be limited.
The number of documents to be queried.
The number of documents to be skipped.
